description: Try our easy to follow Cheesy Polenta Muffins recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cheesy Polenta Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add egg and whisk to combine. Add to dry ingredients along with cheese, zucchini, tomato, olives, if using, and 3/4 of bacon. Spoon mixture evenly into muffin pan and top with remaining bacon. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until set and golden.
